Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Troy in 1965...
Had first career hit on 6/8/1969, off Pablo Chaidez (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/18/1969, off Oscar Alarcon (CC)...
Injured on 7/21/1970 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Longport on 10/4/1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 4/10/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1977, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 4/24/1977...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 8/23/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1978, hitting .481 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 7/26/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/7/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $691,200 per year...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 7/31/1981 (Going to NJ: RF J. Walser. Going to PG: 1B J. Hague, P D. Barta)...
Injured on 7/19/1983 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
